network-modal.warning: Warning: This information will be saved to your local storage, make sure your computer is secure.

tokens.warning-offline: Can't load balances in offline mode

error.decimals: Invalid Decimal. Decimal can only be between 0 and 18.

logout-warning: It seems like you forgot to logout your wallet. For your wallet security, please log out your wallet to continue, or go back to your wallet.
investigate: Use the transaction hash to investigate why this transaction failed.
mewconnect-disconnected: Seems like you are disconnected from MEWconnect / MEW wallet, please reconnect using the App.

config.import-desc: Please click the button below to open and import you configuration file from your local computer.
config.export-desc: Please click the button below to download your configuration file into your local computer.

dashboard-swap: MEW has partnered with DEX.AG, Changelly, Bity, and Simplex to offer competitive rates for all ETH and token swaps, as well as ETH <-> Fiat and ETH <-> BTC

address-book.title: Manage Contact Addresses
address-book.add-up-to: You can add up to 10 contact addresses maximum.
address-book.successfully-added: Successfully added to the address book
address-book.already-exists: This address already exists in the contact book

import-error: Something went wrong while importing file, please make sure it is a valid file

account-content.subheader: Always look for this icon when sending to this wallet
account-content.warning: Please Keep Your Paper Wallet at a {safe} Place! {extend}
account-content.dont-share-priv-key: Please {doNot} Share Your Private Key With Anyone!
